name: Common Cold
description: A mild viral infection of the nose and throat. Symptoms usually resolve in a few days without treatment.

name: Malaria
description: A mosquito-borne disease caused by a parasite. Symptoms include cyclical fever, chills, and flu-like illness.

name: Dengue
description: A viral infection spread by mosquitoes. Known for high fever, severe headache, and joint/muscle pain (breakbone fever).

name: Typhoid
description: A bacterial infection from contaminated food or water. Symptoms include prolonged fever and digestive issues.

name: COVID-19
description: An infectious disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus. Symptoms vary from mild respiratory illness to severe complications.

name: Influenza
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses. Common during seasonal outbreaks, it causes fever and fatigue.
